sentences.en: " Well, Sid don't torment a body the way you do.
sentences.cn: “ 噢, 希德可不像你这样磨人.

sentences.en: At times the memories returned to torment her.
sentences.cn: 有时，她再度想起往事，又会痛苦万分。

sentences.en: Events like this afternoon's are a torment to me in consequence.
sentences.cn: 像今天下午那样的事情,对我来说,结果是场苦难.

sentences.en: He has never suffered the torment of rejection.
sentences.cn: 他从未经受过遭人拒绝的痛苦.

sentences.en: He spent days in torment while the police searched for his stolen car.
sentences.cn: 在警方搜寻他遭窃汽车的同时，他在极度苦恼中过了好些天。
他的学生时期是一场苦难.

sentences.en: His shyness made public speaking a torment to him.
sentences.cn: 他很腆,当众讲话简直是受罪.

sentences.en: It was wicked of you to torment the poor girl.
sentences.cn: 你折磨那可怜的女孩,真是恶劣.
猜忌的心理开始来折磨他了.

sentences.en: Lunch in the hot, crowded, noise - filled canteen was torment.
sentences.cn: 食堂里拥挤酷热, 喧嚣一片,吃中饭简直是受罪.

sentences.en: My older brother and sister used to torment me by singing it to me.
sentences.cn: 哥哥姐姐以前常唱那首歌来戏弄我。

sentences.en: Outdoors, mosquitoes and midges were a perpetual torment.
sentences.cn: 在户外，蚊子和蠓虫永远让人不得安生。

sentences.en: Seth was tormented by feelings of guilt.
She lay awake all night in torment.
sentences.cn: 她一晚上都醒着，在痛苦中煎熬。

sentences.en: The journey must have been a torment for them.
sentences.cn: 这次旅途对他们来说一定十分痛苦。

sentences.en: The torment of having her baby kidnapped is written all over her face.
sentences.cn: 因孩子被绑架所受的万分折磨全写在她脸上。

sentences.en: They represented the Buddha as the saviour from almost unlimited torment.
sentences.cn: 他们推尊佛陀为无边苦难的救主.

sentences.en: What a torment this illness is!
